how_it_works.title: How it works
how_it_works.step_1: You send us any picture you wish to have hand painted in oil painting.
how_it_works.step_2: As soon as we have received payment the artist starts painting.
how_it_works.step_3: When finished the artist sends you a picture of the result to make sure you're fully satisfied and makes any changes you request.
how_it_works.step_4: The painting is framed with a wooden structure and is packed for transport.
how_it_works.step_5: The package is sent directly to your delivery address.

super_easy.title: Super easy!
super_easy.description: You send us any picture you wish to have painted or choose from our Gallery.

best_price.title: Best price!
best_price.description: If you find cheaper on the net, we give you the same price plus a 5 % discount.

best_service.title: Best service!
best_service.description: Our experienced artists won't stop painting until you're fully satisfied.
